LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.Enable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select for Enable or Disable CDN

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.DisableSsl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When SSL pages are returned no CDN URLs will appear in HTML Pages

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.EnableImages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select for Enable or Disable CDN for Images

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.EnableCss.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select for Enable or Disable CDN for Css

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.EnableJs.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select for Enable or Disable CDN for Js

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.IsAzureBlobStorageAsAnOrigin
LocaleResource.Value: Is AzureBlobStorage enabled and set as origin type for CDN

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.IsAzureBlobStorageAsAnOrigin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked, images will be fetched from azure CDN when origin type for CDN is set to BlobStorage. Make sure you have configured AzureBlobStorage correctly in Web.config file. Make sure to clear cache after changes.

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.IsAzureBlobStorageAsOrigin.Instruction
LocaleResource.Value: [CDN with AzureBlobStorage only supports images and not stylesheets and javascript files.

LocaleResource.Name: XcellenceIT.Plugin.Misc.CDN.Field.ClearCacheNote
LocaleResource.Value: Make sure to clear cache after changes.]
